snippet: Over 120 Boston College students have fallen ill and public health officials said that norovirus was found at a Chipotle restaurant at the center of the outbreak.
abstract: Public health officials in Boston confirm 120 Boston College students who contracted norovirus all did so at Chipotle restaurant.
lead_paragraph: Over 120 Boston College students have fallen ill and public health officials said that norovirus was found at a Chipotle restaurant at the center of the outbreak.

headline.main: Officials Confirm Norovirus in a Chipotle Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Officials Confirm Norovirus in a Chipotle Outbreak
